name: John Doe
text: Great product! It exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend it.

name: Jane Smith
text: Not bad, but there are some improvements needed. I'll give it 3 stars.

name: Mike Johnson
text: This is the worst product I've ever purchased. 1 star is too much!

name: Sarah Wilson
text: Decent quality for the price. I'm giving it 4 stars.

name: David Brown
text: A solid product with a fair price. I'll rate it 4 stars.
